body:
For flast clickers like me, when I'm low on health and trying to run away in a tunnel or building in gerneral, I click very quickly. (11 Times a second). Then when I really need to place blocks in a hurry before I die, the anti cheats comes along and kills me.

I HATE THIS. REMOVE IT.

title: Remove the damn Anti Cheat for Blocks

replies.body: Removing it would result in more hacks that actually work.

replies.body:
OFF TOPIC: Damn, Hell, and Sexy are not bad words. They are just a little extreme version of Dang, Heck, and Hot.

There will come a time when you will have to accept that you can't make people stop saying even harsher language.

ON TOPIC: Wrll it doesn't really effect me cause my computer sucks, but I'm getting a better one over the summer, so I would like something to be put into place.
